name: retext-dom
description: Create a (living) DOM tree from a TextOM tree
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test/index.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single], no-cond-assign: false'
scripts.lint-test: node_modules/.bin/eslint test/index.js --env node --env browser --env mocha --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
